trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> control.

In a visual designer, when the user switches from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
When the user switches back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
The HiddenFieldDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> in a visual designer.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner.Initialize%2A> method prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HiddenFieldDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control on the design surface.
Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the markup for a placeholder that includes the control class name and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property.
A string containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField"></xref> at design time.
Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.
The designer calls the Initialize method when it is ready to use the designer to render the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
The Initialize and its base methods configure properties and connect to events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.
The `component` parameter is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control that is associated with this designer or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HiddenField> control.
